a sudden, unwanted taste of stardom. On Tuesday, during an interview on Gaydar Radio, Betty Kitten Ross 's dad, Jonathan Ross , was asked how he'd feel his daughter came home with a woman. Well, my oldest daughter is gay, so that's a question that I have dealt with on a regular basis, he replied. At which point the student found herself momentarily as big a news story as Tony Blair , Andy Coulson and Alan Johnson combined.
